title: Fundrae Scam gift
body: So i just gifted a guy who promised he would gift me back, and as soon as i gifted him he removed me off his friends list, can someone please revert the gift or something. We are on Oceanic server and my IGN Is 'Emerald Taric' and his ign is 'Fundrae' . Thanks for your time

replies.body: Your fault for taking the risk for trusting someone that you don't know bro, they won't revert/refund a gift.
there ya go hes going to re add u an gift u
hey man that sucks but he can get banned for that
I met that guy too hes in my friend list right now and has been saying that he will trade me a gift for a gift. TY
get him to gift u 1st XD
yeah dont do it, no worries bud
